agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: JHR 100 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria Please note the time change from 7:30 to 8:00am. The Appropriations Subcommittee on Articles I, IV, & V will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget items related to Articles I, IV, & V. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
